div.bibl: Correspondence of Mr. C. Mammon, 208 S. La Salle St., Chicago, Illinois, September 30, 1922.

body.p: This note is to remind you of your engagement to meet with the Greek Committee Monday afternoon, October 2, at 3 o'clock, 19 S. La Salle St., Room 1014.
At this meeting reports will be given by men who have just returned from Smyrna and Constantinople, also a message from the Patriarch. We depend upon you for counsel and cooperation in this meeting.
Please allow nothing to hinder your attendance.
Director of Committee for Greek Relief.
